Text: Doesnt work for me on Ubuntu 12.04. Keeps crashing when I try to run it from PlayOnLinux.

@ baga255

Hm, strange. Is there output in log files?

However, I'm working on Office 2010 package.
This one will work without playonlinux and will have installer.

works great for me! thanks!

there is one more thing to mention: in shortcuts folder edit each file and change "/home/cookie" so that instead of "cookie" there is your user name. :)
